headline.main: FOE ON WANE, SIKORSKI SAYS; Polish Premier Says Dieppe Raid Shows Invasion Is Feasible

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 31 -- The belief that "the period of gradual exhaustion for the enemy has started" was expressed by General Wladyslaw Sikorski, Premier of Poland, in a statement issued on the third anniversary of the German attack on Poland that began the second world conflagration.
abstract: 3d war anniv: rev; Polish Premier Sikorski comment
